EmailTemplate.name: Email Response to Website Form Submission
EmailTemplate.subject: Your inquiry has been received by 10K
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for submitting an inquiry to 10k Advisors!
Someone from the 10K team will be in touch with you soon. In the meantime, please like us on Facebook and follow us on Twitter and LinkedIn.
Nick Hamm CEO 10K Advisors
